title: By the King a proclamation. William R. Whereas His Majesty hath received information upon oath, that the persons hereinafter named have with divers other wicked and traiterous persons entred into a horrid and detestable conspiracy, to assassinate and murder his Majesties sacred person ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
publisher: Re-printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson printer to His most excellent Majesty,
